channel.title: [317]client wont run, The system cannot find the path specified. Help
channel.description: i run the client and i get this, [code]The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] i edit run.bat and this is code [code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: [317]client wont run, The system cannot find the path specified. Help
item.dc:creator: @xxsaxx12 xxsaxx12
item.description:
@xxsaxx12 wrote:

Go to your Java folder in program files, do you have jre6? if not, download https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jre-6u22-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

If that doesnt work, then take out (x86). If not, take a knife, shank your comp, and say “LLLLLLEEEEOOOOORRYYYYYY JENKINSSSS!!”.

The error “The system cannot find the path specified.” usually means you dont have the correct version of jre or jdk in the edit form of the run or compile. Follow the path "C:\Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" If your Program Files does not say (x86) might wanna take that out so it says "C:\Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe"

Read full topic
item.source: [317]client wont run, The system cannot find the path specified. Help

item.title: [317]client wont run, The system cannot find the path specified. Help
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

i run the client and i get this,

The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
i edit run.bat and this is code

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
